channel.title: Marking all mail as read in Gmail
channel.description: This took me a while to figure out, so I am writing down here to help me remember later.  It may also be useful if you are playing with Gmail at all (BTW, the spam filtering on Gmail is very...
channel.dc:creator: Martin
